March 7, 1941.
Dr. Irvin Stewart
Director
Committee on Scientific Aids to Learning
41 East 42nd. Street
New York City
Dear Dr. Stewart:
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters
is intensely interested in an educational transcription
service and exchange. we know something of what the
United States Office of Education is doing and what
NBC IS PLANNING TO DO. IT IS OUR FEELING, HOWEVER, THAT
EVEN MORE COULD BE DONE TO ASSIST EDUCATIONAL BROAD¬
CAST ING IN THIS RESPECT. HAS YOUR COMMITTEE DONE ANY¬
THING RELATIVE TO THIS PARTICULAR PROBLEM? If NOT,
WOULD IT BE WILLING TO UNDERTAKE SOME SUCH PROJECT?
Cordially yours,
Frank E. Schooley
FESjrmw
